ValidationRule.description: Shows an error if the Minimum Length is set and Field Under Minimum Range Message is blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "number"), ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "date"), ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "datetime"), ISPICKVAL(Field_Type__c, "time") ),
ISBLANK(Field_Under_Minimum_Range_Message__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Minimum_Value__c))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field Under Minimum Range Message must be set if Minimum Value is provided.
